documents.document: Well done @foxxmetamedia John, lovely work, reminds me of that lovely album cover art for Cathedral Oceans..... https://t.co/XAhEjaQZod

What a fab cover!! Girls, you look divine! Posh? Shall I go on? https://t.co/DWwUaNEZ0w

Way cool #artisfuture https://t.co/81SEUCe629

Standing in the dark, watching you glow...... https://t.co/Rpqir6yiPQ
@foxxmetamedia Plain and simple, John, you are a genius, from Metamatic to your work with Harold Budd, inspiring, soundtrack of my life..

@MuteUSA PS Mute, Mute UK, Deutschland, follow me on Twitter !
@MuteUSA And a large chunk of my collection, vinyl and CD has always been MUTE! Thanks for being such a visionary Daniel @tnml !
@katemcddd @NOWNESS @jemimakirke Brilliant nowness I do love all of your tweets, been following you for ages, never a misstep, always great!
@MuteUSA @M83 @KC_Lights @Spotify Love M83, saw your show at @rebel_toronto in Toronto. fantastic, inspiring! Welll done MUTE!
Excellent article, great to see vinyl back in Toronto! https://t.co/LFkCv0nr5Y
@jonathanmhooper Hey Jonathan, it's Lawrence! Get in touch, long time, sent you a direct message !

Yes, I know what that is like, I should put a ring on it!!!! https://t.co/GhPxRuKTAi
@goldfrapp Brilliant, would love to see you live, wish I lived in the UK! Congrats on a great new single, looking forward to the LP
@BBC6Music @willmellor4 @BBC6MorningShow Fabtastic Will, can't wait. It's been WAAAAY too long ! Wish you great success !
Wow, can't wait, finally a NEW album from GOLDFRAPP, you just made my week @goldfrapp @MuteUK https://t.co/Y9mV0NqGAG
@VivaBananarama What a fantastic pic, truly.....you look even better than you looked in the 80's, aged like fine posh wine!
@Adweek @COSSETTEen Could be yummier! As Big Macs go.....
@TheVinylFactory Rega has always made a fantastic turntable...even when vinyl was ignored over the past 10 years........
@MicroforumVinyl @CSpollen #run-out groove #maxisingle !!! https://t.co/DRVerhlRSz
Pretty cool, what an industry resurgence, who would have thought? https://t.co/dXj3zLVN1l

Happy Birthday Kate! You are STILL awesome! https://t.co/3c5q5vEreF
@pfurs You're still fab Richard, saw you in Toronto not long ago (not to mention in the 80's and 90's) and once in Vancouver! Brilliant!
@ponteraces @VivaBananarama Bananarama for 10£ ? Outrageous bargain of the decade! I need to move to the the UK!

@MilanRecLabel @ryuichisakamoto Mr. Sakamoto, your music has given me such intense pleasure, for so many years....arigato !
@emiIyfaith So true. Check out the McDonald's menu board.
@sarine_ @semisexuaI it actually doesn't. ...
@semisexuaI Or the Catholics ...or the Protestants ... Just saying.
@MicroforumVinyl Great idea, doing that right now :) David Sylvian's first solo album Brilliant Trees
@VivaBananarama Bananarama, such fun! Being listening (on vinyl!) since the 80's ( are we that old?) Lol... Happy Weekend girls!

@ondeadwaves @MuteUSA @MJASmith @MuteUK @thisismaps @pollyworld Brilliant Polly!
@FreddyAmazin You've heard of Nocturnal Animals? This is unimportant losers.......
@Modernvinyl Not unlike the velvet special Beach House edition of Depression Cherry :) On clear vinyl
@MicroforumVinyl I'm still thrilled that I have my SL-220...still sounds great even though it is an entry level, belt drive turntable :)
@Gourounlian @VivaBananarama @SaraBananarama @KerenBananarama Why????????
@emiIyfaith Like cause they are all assholes ?
@VivaBananarama And you all look fierce!
@ZOLAJESUS When are you touring again? Saw you twice in Toronto, would love to see you again :) Merry New Year! from a huge Canadian fan :)
@VivaBananarama Happy Christmas Girls!
@pollyworld Happy Christmas and a Merry New Year Polly
Cool, exploding xmas gifts.........well done Yves https://t.co/D0M0SCASIz
To all my friends ...Happy Christmas and a Merry New Year! @FashionTruckCda @amandasvart @VivaBananarama @pollyworld @pfurs @mod_stylist
@VivaBananarama Happy Christmas and a Merry New Year to Bananarama! Best to your families as well......Hope you have great successes in 2017
